data.title: Geoff Love Your Favourite TV Themes UK Vinyl LP
data.meta_description: GEOFF LOVE Your Favourite TV Themes (1973 UK 12-track vinyl LP - Geoff Love has selected a further twelve of your favourite TV themes, investing them with his own attractive and popular brand of arrangement to enable you to enjoy these familiar pieces of music in their entirety. Includes the themes from Colditz, Upstairs Downstairs, Black Beauty, A Man Called Ironside, World Of Sport, Nationwide and many more. Housed in a front laminated picture sleeve. GEOFF LOVE Your Favourite TV Themes (1973 UK 12-track vinyl LP - Geoff Love has selected a further twelve of your favourite TV themes, investing them with his own attractive and popular brand of arrangement to enable you to enjoy these familiar pieces of music in their entirety. Includes the themes from Colditz, Upstairs Downstairs, Black Beauty, A Man Called Ironside, World Of Sport, Nationwide and many more. Housed in a front laminated picture sleeve. The sleeve shows some shelfwearto the opening edge, but the vinyl remains in near 'as new' condition MFP50091)

TRACKLISTING AND EXTRA INFORMATION

Side One:

1. Theme From Colditz [from Colditz]

2. Country Matters [from Country Matters]

3. Midweek [from Midweek]

4. The Edwardians [from Upstairs Downstairs]

5. Galloping Home [from Black Beauty]

6. The Ironside Theme [from A Man Called Ironside]

Side Two:

7. Alias Smith And Jones [from Alias Smith And Jones]

8. Memories Of Summer [from 'Love Story' TV Series]

9. Theme From The Strauss Family [from The Strauss Family]

10. The Brothers [from The Brothers]

11. World Of Sport [from World Of Sport]

12. The Good Word [from Nationwide]
